airkiss流程图,实时预览需要装插件，可见仓库中的jpeg
```plantuml
@startuml
<style>
activityDiagram {
  BackgroundColor #33668E
  BorderColor #33668E
  LineColor #33668E
  FontColor white
  FontName arial

  diamond {
    BackgroundColor #ccf
    ' LineColor #00FF00
     LineColor #33668E
    FontColor #33668E
    FontName arial
    FontSize 15
  }
  arrow {
    FontName arial
    FontSize 15
    LineColor #33668E
  }
  partition {
    LineColor #33668E
    BorderColor #33668E
    FontColor #00FF00
    RoundCorner 10
    BackgroundColor PeachPuff
  }
  note {
    FontColor Blue
    LineColor Navy
    BackgroundColor #ccf
  }
}
document {
   BackgroundColor transparent
}
</style> 
start
:WIFI_CONF_START;
note right:配网初始化
:airkiss配网;
->教程、选择家庭wifi并输入密码
:走入sdk逻辑;
:CONNECT_WIFI_MANUAL;
note right: WIFI已手动连接
:WIFI_CONF_START;
note right: 开始配网
:PROTOCOL_START;
note right: 开始进行配网协议传输
:PROTOCOL_SUCCESS;
note right: 配网协议传输成功
:BUSINESS_START;
note right: 开始业务流程
:CREATE_UDP_CONNECTION_START;
note right: 开始与设备建立UDP连接
:CREATE_UDP_CONNECTION_SUCCESS;
note right: 设备建立UDP连接成功
:BUSINESS_QUERY_TOKEN_STATE_START;
note right: 开始查询TOKEN状态
:BUSINESS_QUERY_TOKEN_STATE_SUCCESS;
note right: 查询TOKEN状态成功
:BUSINESS_ADD_DEVICE_START;
note right: 开始绑定设备
:BUSINESS_ADD_DEVICE_SUCCESS;
note right: 绑定设备成功
:BUSINESS_SUCCESS;
note right: 业务流程执行成功
:WIFI_CONF_SUCCESS;
end
@enduml
